question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to Brahmanas during the early medieval period?
1. Brahmanas not only collected taxes from the peasants and artisans but also maintained law and order in the villages
    granted to them.
2. Villages were granted to the Brahamanas forever which undermined the position of the king.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Brahmanas during the early medieval period not only collected taxes from the peasants and artisans but also maintained law and order in the villages which were granted to them. Villages were granted to the Brahamanas forever which undermined the position of the king.
